section.title: Release Transfer Orders by Agent
section.para: To release Transfer Orders by Agend, select the "Release Transfer Orders by Agent" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Release Transfer Orders by Agent Code

section.para: When releasing Transfer Orders by Agent, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to release Transfer Orders for all Agents.
Specify Agent whose Transfer Orders you want to release.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without releasing the Transfer Orders by Agent, returning you to the application desktop.
Releases the Transfer Orders by Agent.
